headline: Stock Indexes Pressured by Tech Weakness
summary: The S&P 500 Index ($SPX ) (SPY ) today is down -0.15%, the Dow Jones Industrials Index ($DOWI ) (DIA ) is up +0.16%, and the Nasdaq 100 Index ($IUXX ) (QQQ ) is down -0.67%. March E-mini S&P futures (ESH26 ) are down -0.16%, and March E-mini Nasdaq futures...

headline: Microchip Releases Custom Firmware For NVIDIA DGX Spark For Its MEC1723 Embedded Controllers
summary: Solution delivers secure boot, power management and system control for complex computingCHANDLER, Ariz., Jan. 08, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Microchip Technology (Nasdaq: MCHP) has announced the release of custom-designed firmware for its MEC1723 Embedded Controller (EC), specifically tailored to support NVIDIA DGX Spark personal AI supercomputers. The software is designed to optimize the MEC1723 EC’s capabilities for system management of AI workloads on the NVIDIA DGX platform. By focusing on fir

headline: Microchip Technology (MCHP) Is Up 16.0% After Raising Q4 Sales Guidance On Broader Demand Recovery
summary: In early January 2026, Microchip Technology raised its December-quarter net sales guidance to about US$1.19 billion, citing stronger-than-expected demand, healthier order backlogs, and progress on reducing internal inventories after a prolonged chip glut. Management also highlighted that a broad-based recovery across industrial, automotive, and other end markets is enabling it to ramp factory utilization, which could help reduce under-utilization costs and support margin repair. We’ll now...
